name: Sprint 1 – Learning & Exercises
body: This sprint covers exercise tasks for the next 2 weeks. Track your progress using To Do → In Progress → Review → Done.

issues.title: Complete Python Basics Module
issues.body: Learn variables, loops, functions, and data types.

issues.title: Build a Simple Django CRUD App
issues.body: Create a small web app with Create, Read, Update, Delete functionality.

issues.title: Write Notes on Git & GitHub Workflows
issues.body: Summarize commands: clone, branch, pull, push, PR workflow.

issues.title: Solve 5 Coding Challenges on LeetCode
issues.body: Practice problem-solving with arrays and strings.

issues.title: Document Sprint Retrospective
issues.body: Write down what went well, what was hard, and improvements for next sprint.
